articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Iranian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Iranian President
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad on Jan. 3.
					 The Iranian president in his message said that it was his pleasure to congratulate Kim Jong Un and the government and people of the DPRK on the New Year 2013.
					
					 He hoped that mankind now suffering from social, moral and cultural crisis would adopt a noble morality to achieve greater stability and wellbeing and bring peace and stability to everyone.
					
					 He hoped that the new year would be the year of pleasure and happiness, wishing Kim Jong Un good health and success in his work and the government and people of the DPRK happiness and prosperity.

articles.title: New Year Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Kuwaiti Emir
articles.content:
New Year Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Kuwaiti Emir
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of New Year greeting from Kuwaiti Emir Sabah Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber Al-Sabah on Dec. 27 last year.
					 The emir said he was pleased to extend sincere congratulations and best wishes to Kim Jong Un on the New Year.
					
					 The emir said that, availing himself of the opportunity, he shared the friendly feelings with Kim Jong Un and hoped that the new year will be a year of happiness for mankind for bringing the world people peace and security as well as welfare and prosperity.
					
					 He wished Kim Jong Un good health and hoped that the fine relations between the friendly two countries and peoples would further develop.
					
					 He expressed his best regards.

articles.title: First Sports Day in New Year Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
First Sports Day in New Year Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- A ceremony for group running of officials of ministries and national institutions took place at Kim Il Sung Square Sunday on the occasion of the first sports day this year.
					 Prior to the running, Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, made an address.
					
					 He said that a firm material and technological foundation has been laid for developing sports and a turn is being effected in the overall sports work of the country including mass sports activities under the deep loving care of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He called upon all the officials to take the lead in carrying out the Workers' Party of Korea's plan for building a highly civilized nation in good health.
					
					 Upon an order for start, the participants, divided into two groups, started running towards Sungri and Changjon streets.
					
					 All the participants kept pace with each other, hardening their will to take an active part in mass sports activities to make a breakthrough in the new year's drive with strong physical bodies.
					
					 The group running was followed by demonstration performances of mass rhythmic exercise and Taekwon-do exercise for health. 
					
					 Colorful sports games took place in industrial establishments in Pyongyang including the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex and many other units on the same occasion
					
					 Group running also took place in all provinces, cities and countries Sunday.

articles.title: More Meetings Vow to Implement Tasks Laid Down in New Year Address
articles.content:
More Meetings Vow to Implement Tasks Laid Down in New Year Address
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- More meetings took place at industrial establishments and cooperative farms across the country to vow to implement the tasks laid down in the New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 Reports were made to be followed by speeches there.
					
					 The reporters and speakers said that Kim Jong Un set this year as a year of great creations and changes for opening an epochal phase of building a thriving socialist country in the onward march of the new century of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea, and clearly indicated the tasks and ways to do so.
					
					 They expressed their resolution to effect a great upswing in production and construction in hearty response to Kim Jong Un's New Year Address, important guidelines which indicated the way of victory to be followed by the party, army and people of the DPRK and a patriotic banner which arouses the whole country to great innovations and leaping progress.
					
					 They stressed the need to bring about a great turn in building an economic giant and improving the standard of people's living under the leadership of Kim Jong Un by embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: S. Korean "Saenuri Party" Denounced for Enacting Anti-DPRK Law
articles.content:
S. Korean "Saenuri Party" Denounced for Enacting Anti-DPRK Law 
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the south Korean "Saenuri Party" on Jan. 3 complained that "enacting the 'human rights law in the north' should no longer be delayed." Those concerned of the supreme committee of the party let loose reckless remarks that "the law must be passed through as early as possible." 
					 Minju Joson Sunday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The moves of the "Saenuri Party" clan to enact the anti-DPRK law are an insult to the social system and people of the dignified DPRK and an undisguised provocation against it. 
					
					 It is a ridiculous and shameless act that the "Saenuri Party" clan who made south Korea the worst human rights tundra in the world pushes for the enactment of the law.
					
					 Such moves are a treachery to block the way of implementing the north-south joint declarations, drive the inter-Korean relations to the phase of catastrophe and ignite a war. 
					
					 The party's persistent moves stem from its sinister intention to divert elsewhere the mounting public discontent with the unpopular rule against human rights and seek the maintenance of confrontation policy. 
					
					 The DPRK will never pardon but resolutely punish those who talk about "human rights" while hurting its dignified social system. 
					
					 If the "National Assembly" of south Korea passes the law through its session, irrevocable grave consequences will be entailed in the inter-Korean relations. The "Saenuri Party" will have to hold entire responsibility for this.

articles.title: Guarantee of Right of Part-time Workers Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Guarantee of Right of Part-time Workers Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Citizens' Solidarity for Democratic Society released a commentary on Jan. 6 demanding the puppet authorities ensure the right of part-time workers.
					 Millions of part-timers in south Korea are not guaranteed the three labor rights and are not allowed to take part in trade union activities, the commentary said.
					
					 Worse still, they are under serious economic pressure as the enterprisers do not pay wages to them, it charged.
					
					 It called for revising the labor evil law at an early date and guaranteeing them their rights.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Regime Rapped for Pushing Project for Improvement of Four Rivers
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Regime Rapped for Pushing Project for Improvement of Four Rivers
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- South Korean CBS on Jan. 9 criticized the Lee Myung Bak regime for pressing for the project for improving four rivers.
					 A newscaster said the survey conducted by the Board of Audit and Inspection showed that not a few problems were spotted during the project, adding that it entailed more serious water pollution.
					
					 Most of 16 weirs built across the four rivers became creviced or were submerged beneath the water, the announcer said, adding that it would cause more severe political meltdown in the future.

articles.title: Book "My Father" Off Press in China
articles.content:
Book "My Father" Off Press in China
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Book "My Father" was published in China on the occasion of the first anniversary of demise of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 It was written by Jindallae Saphariny, chairperson of the Jindallae Children's Foundation.
					
					 A book releasing ceremony took place in China on Dec. 15 last year under the sponsorship of the foundation.
					
					 Present there were officials of the foundation, Arab Information Center in China, Public Center for Diplomatic and Cultural Exchange of China and media. The delegation of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries on a visit to China was invited there.
					
					 Jindallae Saphariny in her speech said that Kim Jong Il showed her and her family affectionate loving care and benevolence to be handed down through generations. She noted that she had the mind to establish the children's foundation to please father Kim Jong Il by doing many good things for the DPRK. The news that he passed away was like a bolt from the blue, she said.
					
					 She finished in tears the writing of the book "My Father" which she planned to present to him on the occasion of his 70th birthday, she  noted.
					
					 She stressed that she made up her mind to present a letter of thanks with the book to the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un who positively supported the establishment of the Jindallae Children's Foundation on the occasion of the first anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Czech, Syrian Personages Support Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
articles.content:
Czech, Syrian Personages Support Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Personages of the Czech Republic and Syria supported the New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 Miroslav Stepan, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party, said that the New Year Address made by Kim Jong Un impressed world progressives when meeting with the DPRK ambassador to his country on Jan. 7.
					
					 I realized once again the noble traits of Kim Jong Un, identical to President Kim Il Sung, in his image making the address, the general secretary said, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Un reviewed the achievements made in the DPRK last year and clearly indicated this year's tasks for the Korean people.
					
					 The Czechoslovak Communist Party is convinced that the Korean people would thoroughly carry out the tasks set forth by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address and thus make greater achievements in the efforts for building an economic giant and achieving national reunification.
					
					 The department director of the General Union of Syrian Peasants met an official of the DPRK embassy in Damascus on the same day.
					
					 The great victory won by the party and people of the DPRK last year is a fruition of the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, he said, adding:
					
					 The tremendous national power provides a sure guarantee for the building of an economic giant and the improvement of the people's living standard.
					
					 Rosy is the prospect of the DPRK's drive for building an economic giant.
					
					 This year will shine as a year of victory and prosperity for the DPRK led by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by Foreign Papers
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers carried articles praising the personality of the dear respected Kim Jong Un as a great man illustrated with photos documenting his revolutionary activities.
					 The Russian paper Our Home Sochi carried an article "The youngest leader in the world" on Dec. 27 last year which said:
					
					 The world people admire Kim Jong Un for his humble and kind-heartedness, humanity, meticulous and benevolent care and dignified and friendly character.
					
					 He carried forward the idea of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il that believes in the people as in Heaven and put their interests above all in leading the country.
					
					 He is not only well versed in modern science and technology but also all fabrics of social life including economic development and its trend, literature and arts.
					
					 He has drawn the world attention as an outstanding supreme commander.
					
					 It is very natural that there are increasing world voices admiring his excellent caliber and perfect personality as a contemporary statesman and strategist.
					
					 His speech at the parade in the celebration of the centenary of birth of the President struck the world with admiration.
					
					 About twelve thousand media outlets around the world said a rosy future is ahead of the DPRK, reporting his speech every day.
					
					 The Cambodia paper Kmae Amata on Jan. 7 said in an article "The great leader of mother party" that the Workers' Party of Korea would always emerge victorious as a mother party amid the absolute support and trust from the popular masses under the guidance of the First Secretary Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper Natun Bangla on Jan. 7 carried an article praising him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was brought out in booklet by the Khabarovsk Territory Publishing House of Russia on December 31 last year.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that it is a principled requirement for the victorious advance of the Korean revolution to hold general secretary Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK into a glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Organizations Carry Kim Jong Un's New Year Address in Bulletins
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Organizations Carry Kim Jong Un's New Year Address in Bulletins
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea and the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee on January 2 respectively carried in their bulletins the detailed gist of the New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 The bulletins in their prefaces said that Kim Jong Un put forward the slogan "Let Us Bring about a Radical Turn in the Building of an Economic Giant with the Same Spirit and Mettle As Were Displayed in Conquering Space!" We are convinced that the party, the army and the people of the DPRK would glorify this year as a year of great creations and changes in which a radical turn will be effected in the building of a thriving socialist country on the road of the onward march in the new century of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, they added.
